bug_1.Title: An error appears while opening downloaded file

StepsToReproduce.ExpectedResult: File is opened successfully. No errors appear.

bug_2.Title: Activation link is not received when creating a new user on the platform

Pre-condition.first_action: User is logged the system by User with Account Admin role

StepsToReproduce.step_3: Click on Add New Member button
StepsToReproduce.step_4: Fill in all fields with valid data
StepsToReproduce.ActualResult: The user is created, a link isn't sent to his email.
StepsToReproduce.ExpectedResult: The user is created, a link is sent to his email.
